wikipedia_page.main:
Ben Addis, born in Blaenavon, is a Welsh actor.
He was part of Gwent Young People's Theatre (GYPT) in Abergavenny and The National Youth Theatre of Wales. He trained at Bristol Old Vic Theatre School.Theatre credits include: Rock and Roll (Duke of York's Theatre), King Lear (RSC), Never So Good (National Theatre), Antigone and Widower's Houses (Manchester Royal Exchange), Cinderella (Warwick Arts Centre / Lyric Hammersmith) and Eurydice (ATC/Plymouth Drum/Young Vic).
Film and TV credits include: Lewis (ITV) and Martin Scorsese's Hugo. 
In February 2020, Addis played the role of Dr. Parker in Channel 4 soap Hollyoaks.
